verses.name: Deuteronomy 16:18
verses.text: Judges and officers shalt thou make thee in all thy gates, which the Lord thy God giveth thee, throughout thy tribes: and they shall judge the people with just judgment.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 16:19
verses.text: Thou shalt not wrest judgment; thou shalt not respect persons, neither take a gift: for a gift doth blind the eyes of the wise, and pervert the words of the righteous.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 16:20
verses.text: That which is altogether just shalt thou follow, that thou mayest live, and inherit the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.
